<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smokesoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2592) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a connection to smoke and haze. You gain the Smoke Blending reaction.

 **Smoke Blending** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([sylph](/Traits.aspx?ID=311)) **Trigger** A creature attempts a flat check to target you because you're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) due to fog, haze, mist, or smoke; **Effect** You shroud yourself in smoke, making it harder for your foe to hit you. If you're concealed, the DC of the flat check increases from 5 to 7; if you're hidden, it increases from 11 to 13.
name: Smokesoul
